snippet.title: Coding For Beginners In Python
snippet.description:
In this video, I'll teach you how to code step by step to get you started coding in python!

Don't worry about how to type or remember any code... I recommend you play with examples and then you'll get the patterns over time! I tried to lay out an easy way for how to code in python for beginners, especially in 2018. 

Coding should be fun, so let's help each other with problems and accelerate MAKING AWESOME THINGS!

Here are the steps outlined for coding for beginners:
1. Find code here: https://www.w3schools.com/
2. Type python code here: https://www.tutorialspoint.com/execute_python_online.php
3. Play with examples here: https://www.w3schools.com/python/python_ref_functions.asp
4. Extra Credit Python functions (more complicated, but you'll get there!): https://python-twitter.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

CHEATSHEET: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1eqEGoB41TTK_y4lkLWK1IKD9WtHCxo4slm-qnptMRds/edit?usp=sharing

I was really lost when I tried learning how to code in python, so I want to help people who are struggling like I was. This encouraged me to make a coding for beginners in python video, especially what you should learn in python for 2018!

You could be anywhere in the world, but you're here with me, and I appreciate it!
tags: how to code in python for beginners
